description: Marcel Pinte was a French Resistance messenger, shot dead by accident in 1944.
title: France honours six-year-old WW2 Resistance agent
title_page: France honours six-year-old WW2 Resistance agent - BBC News
maintext: Another relative, Alexandre Br¨¦maud, spent years researching Marcel's story, because the official records focused on the Resistance fighters and sabotage operations, rather than on the many helpers - often women and children - who also took risks to defeat the Nazi occupation.
